Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball had 34 points, 11 assists, and eight rebounds to lead the Hornets to a 110-105 win over Houston.
Ball made four 3-pointers and all 10 of his free throws to help Charlotte to the victory.
The Hornets trailed by as many as 18 points before surging late to rally for the victory.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball reflected on being back on the court after his tough stretch, saying, 'It’s blessings, just doing what we love.'
First-year coach Charles Lee praised Ball, saying, 'If we have a healthy LaMelo Ball, we’re going to do a lot of really good things.'
Ball was encouraged by how the team came together after struggling early in the game, stating, 'First game, you want to just come out and set a tone.'
